name: Maxoon the Rebel
description:
The Rebels game of Maxoon | Rebels#7282

The group of talented strategists called Rebels wanted to obtain the ultimate hacking tool. Will they get it? You decide!

Controls:

Jetpack:

  • Space to increase height
  • A - D for left - right

Moving:

  • Space to jump
  • A - D for left - right
  • Left mouse button to attack

Hope you enjoy!
